about_the_game:
Explore forgotten land, climb on structures, view the scenery and interact with NPCs and environment to discover secrets and more fun facts from most recent campaign from BaniakBaniaka.
Play this single person mode game walking simulator and spend time exploring the environment to find interactive items that provide more context on world or characters.
Use free view to take screenshots of locations. Follow simple quests, ride a mule.

This game is in early stages of production, more content will follow with future updates.
Step into the epic world of "Kharakow," a fan-made game brought to life by the passionate creators of the Albion Forge.
Inspired by the gripping RPG campaign "Wydaleni" hosted on the popular polish YouTube channel Baniak Baniaka, this game is a tribute to the dwarven residents of Kharakow.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages. It may contain General Mature Content, Crime, Brutality, and may include Nudity or Sexual Content.

name: Kharakov

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated compatible soundcard
  • VR Support: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Explore forgotten land, climb on structures, view the scenery and interact with NPCs and environment to discover secrets and more lore from most recent campaign from BaniakBaniaka.
